note.p: Daughter of Samuel Eliot, a wealthy Boston businessman, and his wife Catherine Atkins. Married Andrews Norton in 1821. Mother of Charles Eliot Norton.
ANB s.v. Norton, Andrews and Norton, Charles Eliot
North America, family histories, 1500–2000 History of the Dudley Family with genealogical tables, pedigrees, &c: 1 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 October 2022)
